long_description: The Electra Verse 21D bike boasts eye-catching style and efficient design, so whether you're looking to commute in comfort or cruise down backroads, you'll look and feel great getting there. Aluminum frame features internal cable routing for clean lines and protection from road grime; eyelets for fenders and a rear rack (sold separately) enhance utility. A sweeping top tube mimics a step-through design for easy mounting and dismounting. Shimano trigger shifters control the Shimano derailleurs for easy, precise shifts between the 21 gear combinations, letting you pedal with ease. Road-style, dual-pivot caliper brakes ensure speed management is easy and effective. Mixed Tread tires supply great versatility, providing smooth-rolling performance on roads, paths and hard-packed gravel. Convenient platform pedals do not require special shoes. Specs on the Electra Verse 21D bike are subject to change.
short_description: The Electra Verse 21D bike boasts eye-catching style and efficient design, so whether you're looking to commute in comfort or cruise down backroads, you'll look and feel great getting there.
